author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10011792/

New to the world of Random or simply need a refresher? 🎲
Join Senior Narrative Designer and Writer Oskar Hanska as he walks you through the enchanting and eerie tales of Lost in Random - and sets the stage for your next roll in The Eternal Die.

From cursed kingdoms to living dice, uncover the key moments, characters, and lore you’ll want to know before diving into Mare’s twisted new games.

🃏 Lost in Random: The Eternal Die launches June 17 on PS5 - or roll early with Advanced Access, exclusively available via Fortune Edition pre-orders as of today!

#ps5 #ps5games #lostinrandom
title: Lost in Random: The Eternal Die - Official Lore Recap | PS5 Games

*Please be advised that the PlayStation®4 version will not be sold outside of Japan.

author: PlayStation
description:
Join Selene in Oscuro, a charming puzzle game where her ability to absorb and emit light from various flowers is key to navigating the world and overcoming obstacles.

title: Oscuro Blossom's Glow - Announcement Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games
